p: The host was identified as Anas platyrhynchos, A. platyrhynchos x A. crecca, A. poecilorhyncha, and Tadorna tadorna ( Figure S1). Due to the similarity of the genes, the species could not be differentiated among the four birds and thus, the host was described as wild duck for our isolate. The sequence of COI (539 bp) is provided in Table S1.
